metadata.title: CVE-2022-2601 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was found in grub_font_construct_glyph(). A maliciouscrafted pf2 font can lead to an overflow when calculating themax_glyph_size value, allocating a smaller than needed buffer for theglyph, this further leads to a buffer overflow and a heap basedout-of-bounds write. An attacker may use this vulnerability to circumventthe secure boot mechanism.

criterions.comment: grub2-unsigned package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
grub2-signed package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
